directions.step:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease an 8 x 8 or similar baking pan. Cut apples in quarters. Peel (I don't peel mine) and cut out core. Slice thin; put in pan. Mix oats, sugar and flour. Mix butter or margarine in with your fingers. Mixture will be crumbly. Put mixture on apples. Bake about 35 minutes.
If desired, serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or some whipped topping. Serves 6.
